text: Javier Krahe de Salas (March 30 1944 – July 12, 2015) was a Spanish singer- songwriter. He met Joaquín Sabina and Alberto Pérez after his services in the military. As a trio, they recorded La mandrágora. He also worked at TVE on the television show Si yo fuera presidente ("If I Were President"). Krahe died of a heart attack on July 12, 2015 in Zahara de los Atunes, Cádiz. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Spanish singer-songwriters Category:Writers from Madrid Category:Musicians from Madrid
title: Javier Krahe
